# Interface TTSOutputStreamIterator

Streaming interface for Text-to-Speech (TTS) output from graph nodes.

Provides asynchronous streaming for synthesized speech data with audio and metadata.

interface TTSOutputStreamIterator {  
next: () => Promise<[TTSOutputStreamIterationResult](./common_data_types_common.TTSOutputStreamIterationResult)>;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

next

## Properties

### next

next: () => Promise<[TTSOutputStreamIterationResult](./common_data_types_common.TTSOutputStreamIterationResult)>

Asynchronously reads the next TTS output chunk from the stream.

#### Type declaration

  *     * (): Promise<[TTSOutputStreamIterationResult](./common_data_types_common.TTSOutputStreamIterationResult)>
    * #### Returns Promise<[TTSOutputStreamIterationResult](./common_data_types_common.TTSOutputStreamIterationResult)>

Promise resolving to a result object with TTS output content or done flag
